casebody.data:
GRIEVANCE ADMINISTRATOR, Petitioner,
v.
Andrew Leo SHIRVELL, Respondent. SC: 158309 Supreme Court of Michigan. January 23, 2019

Order

Upon de novo review by the entire Court in accordance with MCR 2.003(D)(2)(b), the Court orders that respondent's motion to disqualify Justice Elizabeth T. Clement from participating in the decision of this case is DENIED for the reason that respondent has not alleged facts establishing an appearance of impropriety or a serious risk of actual bias from her participation in the case. MCR 2.003(C)(1)(b).

CLEMENT , J., did not participate in the decision on this disqualification motion.

CAVANAGH , J., did not participate due to her prior service as a member of the Attorney Grievance Commission.
